name: Dick Rathmann
introduction: Dick Rathmann (born 6 January 1924 and died 1 February 2000) was an American racecar driver who participated in multiple Indianapolis 500 races between 1950 and 1964. His performances in 1950 and between 1956 and 1960 were counted towards the Formula One championship, including the two points he scored at the 1956 Indianapolis 500.
